metadata.title: Minecraft Skin Editor and Tester | Mineskin.pro
metadata.description: Upload and test your Minecraft skins in real-time with MineSkin's 3D viewer. Test, edit, and see your skin from every angle before using it in-game.

detailPanel.changeSkinModeDescription: This will change the skin mode to slim mode. This will modify the skin texture.
detailPanel.restartTutorialDescription: Restart the tutorial to see the onboarding instructions again.
detailPanel.reportBug: If you want to report a bug, you can file an issue on the
detailPanel.orJoinDiscord: Or if you prefer, you can join the

cookie.title: Cookie Settings
cookie.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience. Learn more in our

pwa.title: Install App
pwa.description: Install MineSkin on your device for a faster, app-like experience with offline support and quick access from your home screen.

offline.title: Could not load the page
offline.description: Please check your internet connection and try again.

tutorial.skipConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to skip the tutorial? You can always restart it later in the settings.
tutorial.welcomeContent: This quick tutorial will walk you through the basic editing features of Mineskin.pro.
tutorial.penToolContent: This is your main drawing tool. Use the Pen tool to draw on your skin pixel by pixel.
tutorial.eraserContent: Use the Eraser to remove pixels from your skin.
tutorial.eraserNote: Note: The eraser will erase the top layer of the skin if both are active.
tutorial.undoRedoContent: Made a mistake? No worries! You can easily undo and redo your actions here.
tutorial.undoRedoShortcuts: You can also use the keyboard shortcuts
tutorial.undoRedoNote: Note: The undo/redo actions are not persistent after reload.
tutorial.colorPickerContent: You can choose any color you want from the picker, or select from the palette of colors already used in your skin.
tutorial.partFilterDesktopContent: Here you can toggle the visibility of different body parts for both layers. This is useful for editing parts that are hard to reach.
tutorial.partFilterMobileContent: Click this button to open the visibility settings. You can toggle the visibility of different body parts for both layers.
tutorial.finishContent: That's it for the basics! For more advanced features and information, you can refer to the

colorPicker.pressEnterToConfirm: Press Enter to confirm or Escape to cancel

partFilter.title: Body Parts
partFilter.visibilityDescription: Configure visibility settings for different parts of the skin model.
partFilter.head: Head
